content: crochet a christmas tree skirt to fit any tree and hide unsightly wires or tree stands this beginner friendly pattern has a full video tutorial available on my youtube channel choose to make the pattern in 1 2 or as many colours as you d like to suit your holiday decor the pattern includes written instructions for 4 sizes 20 table top trees 42 -4-6 foot trees 48 for 7 foot trees 56 for any taller trees size is measured across the middle of the skirt when laid flat from peak to peak materials based on 42 tree skirt any worsted /aran weight acrylic yarn i used paintbox yarns simply aran 100% acrylic 100g 3 5oz 184m 201 yds in the following 2 shades a - pillar red 214 b- paper white 200 designer made 42 skirt and used 600m in a and 400m in b 5mm crochet hook scissors tapestry needle don t forget to follow and tag me on social media facebook www facebook com/cosyrosieuk instagram @cosyrosieuk www cosyrosieuk com important i do not accept returns or refunds please do not copy or claim as your own you may sell physical product versions of these however please credit me as the designer please do not sell the pdf if you have any questions please contact me via the contact option on my page or pop me an email at fiona@cosyrosieuk co uk all design and photos are copyright of cosy rosie uk fiona field © 2023
